name: Leap of Faith (Floris0106, MerlinWizard)
description:
Leap of Faith is a parkour game made in seven days for the Explosive Game jam hosted by Bbomb. It is a 3D first person puzzle-platformer where you have a limited amount of jumps.

The theme of the game jam was "Out of Bounds". A bound can mean a leaping movement towards or over something. When you are out of bounds you have no jumps left.

Controls:
Walking: WASD
Sprint: Shift
Jump: Space
Air Jump: Space
Super Jump: C
Leap: V
Interact: Left Mouse
